game.beginning: In the thriving kingdom within the multiverse, you, the destined hero, are awakened from your age-long sleep by Agents of Harmony.
game.ending: After an epic battle, you successfully restore balance by sealing off the disruption. The kingdom rejoices, and you enter a deep slumber, awaiting the call of duty once more.
game.synopsis: In 'Waves of the Multiverse', you navigate through different universes, battling ferocious monsters and disrupting events, all caused by an unknown force disrupting reality. Guided by the Agents of Harmony, you fulfill your destiny as the hero of the kingdom, restore balance, and ensure the survival of all universes.
game.title: Waves of the Multiverse
